questions.question_text: Mārā vighno, pāp, dosh tathā durguņo avashya nāsh ____. Hu avashya shānti, param ānand ane sukh pāmīsh.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is 'Mārā vighno, pāp, dosh tathā durguņo avashya nāsh pāmashe. Hu avashya shānti, param ānand ane sukh pāmīsh.'

questions.question_text: je je mārā kahevāyā chho temā māre ek talmātra kasar rahevā devī nathī. Māțe tame pan sūdhā sāvadhān rahejyo; jo jarāy gāfalāī rākhasho to tamāro pag takashe nahī. Ane māre to je tame Bhagwānnā bhakta chho tenā hrudaymā koī jātnī vāsanā tathā koī jātno ayogya swabhāv te rahevā devo nathī.
questions.explanation: This quote is found in Vachanamrut Gadhada I-45.

questions.question_text: Kāran ke mane sākşhāt Akshar-Purushottam Mahārāj malyā chhe. Temanā baļe hu jarūr dukhne ____ jaīsh.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is 'Kāran ke mane sākşhāt Akshar-Purushottam Mahārāj malyā chhe. Temanā baļe hu jarūr dukhne tarī jaīsh.'

questions.question_text: Sukh dukh äve sarve bheļu, temā rākhajyo sthir mati; Jāļavīsh mārā janne, vaļī karīsh jatan ati. Em karatā jo pand padashe, to āgaļ sukh chhe ati ghaņu; Pan vrat tek jo tāļasho to, bhogavasho sahu sahu taņu. Nahi to tame nachint rahejyo, karavu tamāre kāī nathī; Je malyā chhe tamane, te pār chhe Aksharthī.
questions.explanation: This quote is found in Bhaktachintamani 76/39-41.

questions.question_text: Ā rīte vichārnu baļ rākhī āshrit bhakta kyārey ____ na hāre ane Bhagwānnā bale ānandmā rahe.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is 'Ā rīte vichārnu baļ rākhī āshrit bhakta kyārey himmat na hāre ane Bhagwānnā bale ānandmā rahe.'

questions.question_text: Te Bhagwānno jene pratyaksh pramān dradh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī bīk na rākhavī je, 'Hu rakhe marine bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!' Evī āshankā manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme pan vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān rahevā de nahī.
questions.explanation: This quote is found in Vachanamrut Gadhada અંત્ય-7

questions.question_text: Shāstramā tathā lokmā nishedh karyo hoy tevā sthānone vishe kyārey thūnkavu nahī tathā ____ na karavu.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is 'Shāstramā tathā lokmā nishedh karyo hoy tevā sthānone vishe kyārey thūnkavu nahī tathā mal-mūtrādi na karavu.'

questions.question_text: Nūnam ____ me vighnāh pāpa-doshāsh-cha dur-guņāhā | Nūnam prāpsyāmyaham shāntim ānandam paramam sukham ||
questions.explanation: The complete shlok is 'Nūnam nankshyanti me vighnāh pāpa-doshāsh-cha dur-guņāhā | Nūnam prāpsyāmyaham shāntim ānandam paramam sukham ||'

questions.question_text: Vichāryaivam balam ____ nā’shrito nirbalo bhavet | Anandito bhaven-nityam Bhagavad bala vaibhavāt ||
questions.explanation: The complete shlok is 'Vichāryaivam balam rakshed nā’shrito nirbalo bhavet | Anandito bhaven-nityam Bhagavad bala vaibhavāt ||'

questions.question_text: Şhṭhīvanam mala-mūtrādi-visarjanam ____ cha | Shāstra-loka-nishiddheshu na kartavyam kadāchana ||
questions.explanation: The complete shlok is 'Şhṭhīvanam mala-mūtrādi-visarjanam sthaleshu cha | Shāstra-loka-nishiddheshu na kartavyam kadāchana ||'
